summary: The document is a declassified memo associated with the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992, detailing instructions for a special agent on conducting an investigation. It highlights the use of covert operations, the involvement of the DFO in performing NAC's, and includes comprehensive sections on field office operations, special instructions, and distribution.
key_findings: The document is part of the records released under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992.
It provides specific instructions for conducting an investigation, emphasizing covert operations where feasible.
Mentions the role of DFO in conducting NAC's, indicating a structured approach to the investigation.
Includes details on field office operations and special instructions, suggesting a comprehensive investigation process.
